tool_description: Simple API that provides champion stats / builds from https://www.mobafire.com/
name: Mobafire LoL Builds
title: Mobafire LoL Builds

api_list.name: Get User Build Info
api_list.description:
Provides information from selected build based on champid and buildid params. Info includes:
-pathmain
-pathsecondary
-mainrunes
-secondaryrunes
-bonusrunes
-items
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mobafire-lol-builds.p.rapidapi.com/api/builds/soraka-8/12-8-bizzleberrys-support-soraka-guide-season-12-543705"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mobafire-lol-builds.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://mobafire-lol-builds.p.rapidapi.com/api/builds/{champid}/{buildid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mobafire-lol-builds.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Champion Suggested Runes
api_list.description: Returns suggested runes for selected champion based on high win percentage rune combo.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mobafire-lol-builds.p.rapidapi.com/api/champions/rammus-24/runes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mobafire-lol-builds.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get User Builds For Champion
api_list.description: Returns list of most popular builds for selected champion. The "buildid" is extracted from the url and is used to get that specific builds info in "GET User Build Info"
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mobafire-lol-builds.p.rapidapi.com/api/builds/warwick-11"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mobafire-lol-builds.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Champion Stats
api_list.description:
Returns selected champion stats
Includes: name, champid,  winP,  banP,  pickP,  and url
api_list.code:

api_list.name: Get Champions Counters
api_list.description: Get easiest matchups for selected champion based on "counter rate" from counterstats.net
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mobafire-lol-builds.p.rapidapi.com/api/champions/kayle-2/counters"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mobafire-lol-builds.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Champions That Counter My Champion
api_list.description: Returns the hardest matchups for your selected champion based on "counter rate" from counterstats.net
api_list.code:

        }

api_list.name: Get Champion ID List
api_list.description:
Returns list of champion names along with their champid.
-Organized by winP
api_list.code:

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mobafire-lol-builds.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Champion Stats
api_list.description:
Returns champions organized by win percentage.
Includes: name, champid,  winP,  banP,  pickP,  and url
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mobafire-lol-builds.p.rapidapi.com/api/champions"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mobafire-lol-builds.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
